@graph.rdfs:label: notation
@graph.skos:definition: A notation is different from a lexical label in that a notation is not normally recognizable as a word or sequence of words in any natural language.

@graph.rdfs:label: service endpoint
@graph.skos:definition: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (a web-resolvable IRI).

@graph.rdfs:label: table schema
@graph.skos:definition: Schema of the provided distribution data.

@graph.rdfs:label: centroid
@graph.skos:definition: The geographic center (centroid) of a resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: publisher
@graph.skos:definition: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

@graph.rdfs:label: primary key
@graph.skos:definition: A column reference property that holds either a single reference to a column description object or an array of references.

@graph.rdfs:label: has ODRL policy
@graph.skos:definition: Identifies an ODRL (Open Digital Rights Language) Policy for which the identified Asset is the target Asset to all the Rules.

@graph.rdfs:label: has usage
@graph.skos:definition: Dataset or distribution usage guidance/instructions.

@graph.rdfs:label: in category
@graph.skos:definition: Represents the category a dimension is grouped in.

@graph.rdfs:label: Location
@graph.skos:definition: A spatial region or named place.

@graph.rdfs:label: harvesting
@graph.skos:definition: Description of data harvesting (ETL).

foaf:name.@value: University of Ljubljana, Faculty of Computer and Information Science

@graph.rdfs:label: contact point
@graph.skos:definition: Relevant contact information for the catalogued resource. Use of vCard is recommended.

@graph.rdfs:label: language
@graph.skos:definition: A language of the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: compression format
@graph.skos:definition: The compression format of the distribution in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file.

@graph.rdfs:label: Activity
@graph.skos:definition: An activity is something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; it may include consuming, processing, transforming, modifying, relocating, using, or generating entities.

@graph.rdfs:label: Quality measurement
@graph.skos:definition: Represents the evaluation of a given dataset (or dataset distribution) against a specific quality metric.

@graph.rdfs:label: packaging format
@graph.skos:definition: The package format of the distribution in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together.

@graph.rdfs:label: media type
@graph.skos:definition: The media type of the distribution as defined by IANA.

@graph.rdfs:label: theme taxonomy
@graph.skos:definition: The knowledge organization system (KOS) used to classify catalog's datasets.

@graph.rdfs:label: keyword
@graph.skos:definition: A keyword or tag describing a resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: data access service
@graph.skos:definition: A site or end-point that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.

@graph.rdfs:label: preferred label
@graph.skos:definition: The preferred labels are useful when generating or creating human-readable representations of a knowledge organization system. These labels provide the strongest clues as to the meaning of a SKOS concept.

@graph.rdfs:label: access rights
@graph.skos:definition: Information about who access the resource or an indication of its security status.

@graph.rdfs:label: publisher
@graph.skos:definition: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

@graph.rdfs:label: Schema
@graph.skos:definition: A Schema is a definition of a tabular format that may be common to multiple tables.

@graph.rdfs:label: service
@graph.skos:definition: A site or endpoint that is listed in the catalog.

@graph.rdfs:label: is version of
@graph.skos:definition: A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation.

@graph.rdfs:label: primary topic
@graph.skos:definition: The primary topic of some page or document.

@graph.rdfs:label: checksum
@graph.skos:definition: The checksum property provides a mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a File or Package have not changed.

@graph.rdfs:label: byte size
@graph.skos:definition: The size of a distribution in bytes.

@graph.rdfs:label: at time
@graph.skos:definition: An event, that happened at specific time.

@graph.rdfs:label: format
@graph.skos:definition: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.

@graph.vaem:rationale: Mandatory (Catalog, Dataset, Usage, Usage tool), Recommended (Distribution), Optional (Catalog record, Data service).
@graph.rdfs:label: description
@graph.skos:definition: An account of the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: License document
@graph.skos:definition: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: evaluation value
@graph.skos:definition: Refers to values computed by metric.

@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset
skos:definition: A collection of data, published or curated by a single source, and available for access or download in one or more represenations.
A conceptual entity that represents the information published.

@graph.rdfs:label: conforms to
@graph.skos:definition: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.

@graph.rdfs:label: value Url
@graph.skos:definition: An URI template property that is used to map the values of cells into URLs.

@graph.rdfs:label: sample
@graph.skos:definition: Links to a sample of an Asset (which is itself an Asset).

@graph.rdfs:label: date issued
@graph.skos:definition: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

@graph.vaem:rationale: The concept was added to the ontology to represent the root concept that includes all the datasets along with the distributions within an open data portal, which is represented using this concept.
@graph.rdfs:label: Catalog
skos:definition: A curated collection of metadata about resources (e.g., datasets and data services in the context of a data catalog).
A catalogue or repository that hosts the Datasets or Data Services being described.

foaf:name.@value: University of Ljubljana, Faculty of Computer and Information Science

@graph.rdfs:label: contains municipality data
@graph.skos:definition: Property that defines whether a resource contains municipality-related data.

@graph.rdfs:label: part of
@graph.skos:definition: Indication of the catalog being a part of other catalog.

@graph.rdfs:label: katalog
@graph.skos:definition: A catalog whose contents are of interest in the context of this catalog.

@graph.rdfs:label: name
@graph.skos:definition: An atomic property that gives a single canonical name for the column. The value of this property becomes the name annotation for the described column.

@graph.rdfs:label: spatial resolution (meters)
@graph.skos:definition: minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters.

@graph.rdfs:label: required
@graph.skos:definition: A boolean atomic property taking a single value which indicates whether the cell must have a non-null value. The default is `false`.

@graph.rdfs:label: theme
@graph.skos:definition: A main category of the resource. A resource can have multiple themes.

@graph.rdfs:label: language
@graph.skos:definition: An atomic property giving a single string language code as defined by [BCP47].

@graph.rdfs:label: Identifier
@graph.skos:definition: A complex type (UN/CEFACT) that enables definition of unique identifiers.

@graph.rdfs:label: geometry
@graph.skos:definition: Associates any Resource with the corresponding Geometry.

@graph.rdfs:label: home web page
@graph.skos:definition: A Web page that can be navigated to in a Web browser to gain access to the catalog, a dataset, its distributions and/or additional information.

@graph.rdfs:label: row titles
@graph.skos:definition: A column reference property that holds either a single reference to a column description object or an array of references.

@graph.rdfs:label: Usage
@graph.skos:definition: Actions that can be performed on a given dataset or distribution.

@graph.rdfs:label: has dataset feedback
@graph.skos:definition: User feedback associated with Dataset or distribution.

@graph.rdfs:label: title
@graph.skos:definition: A natural language property that provides possible alternative names for the column.

@graph.rdfs:label: about URL
@graph.skos:definition: A URI template property that MAY be used to indicate what a cell contains information about.

@graph.rdfs:label: provenance
@graph.skos:definition: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

@graph.rdfs:label: in dimension
@graph.skos:definition: Represents the dimensions a quality metric, certificate and annotation allow a measurement of.

@graph.rdfs:label: Data service
skos:definition: A site or end-point providing operations related to the discovery of, access to, or processing functions on, data or related resources.
A collection of operations that provides access to one or more datasets or data processing functions.

@graph.rdfs:label: metadata time
@graph.skos:definition: Time, when metadata was collected.

@graph.rdfs:label: Usage tool
@graph.skos:definition: A tool that can use a dataset or distribution.

@graph.rdfs:label: virtual
@graph.skos:definition: A boolean atomic property taking a single value which indicates whether the column is a virtual column not present in the original source.

@graph.rdfs:label: bounding box
@graph.skos:definition: The geographic bounding box of a resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: temporal coverage
@graph.skos:definition: Temporal characteristics of the resource.

@graph.vaem:rationale: Mandatory (Catalog, Dataset, ConceptScheme, Data service, Harvesting, Usage, UsageTool), Optional (Distribution, Catalog record).
@graph.rdfs:label: title
@graph.skos:definition: A name given to the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: license
@graph.skos:definition: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: mass download enabled
@graph.skos:definition: Property that defines whether a mass download is enabled for a resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: type
@graph.skos:definition: The nature or genre of the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: distribution
@graph.skos:definition: An available distribution of the dataset.

@graph.rdfs:label: is high value dataset
@graph.skos:definition: Property defines whether a dataset is of high value, according to the EU's Act that defines a list of High-Value Datasets.

@graph.rdfs:label: Standard
@graph.skos:definition: A reference point against which other things can be evaluated or compared.

@graph.rdfs:label: legal ground non-SOP
@graph.skos:definition: Legal ground without having a SOP number.

@graph.rdfs:label: Column
@graph.skos:definition: A Column represents a vertical arrangement of Cells within a Table.

rdfs:label: references
accrual periodicity
skos:definition: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.
The frequency with which items are added to a collection.

@graph.rdfs:label: Dimension
@graph.skos:definition: Represents criteria relevant for assessing quality. Each quality dimension must have one or more metric to measure it. A dimension is linked with a category using the dqv:inCategory property.

@graph.rdfs:label: identifier
@graph.skos:definition: A unique identifier of the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: download URL
@graph.skos:definition: The URL of the downloadable file in a given format. E.g. CSV file or RDF file. The format is indicated by the distribution's dct:format and/or dcat:mediaType.

@graph.rdfs:label: data type
@graph.skos:definition: An object property that contains either a single string that is the main datatype of the values of the cell or a datatype description object. If the value of this property is a string, it MUST be one of the built-in datatypes defined in section 5.11.1 Built-in Datatypes or an absolute URL; if it is an object then it describes a more specialised datatype.

@graph.vaem:rationale: Optional. Domain and range types should match.
@graph.rdfs:label: source
@graph.skos:definition: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

@graph.rdfs:label: Concept scheme
@graph.skos:definition: A SKOS concept scheme can be viewed as an aggregation of one or more SKOS concepts. Semantic relationships (links) between those concepts may also be viewed as part of a concept scheme. This definition is, however, meant to be suggestive rather than restrictive, and there is some flexibility in the formal data model.

@graph.rdfs:label: Distribution
skos:definition: A specific representation of a dataset. A dataset might be available in multiple serializations that may differ in various ways, including natural language, media-type or format, schematic organization, temporal and spatial resolution, level of detail or profiles (which might specify any or all of the above).
A physical embodiment of the Dataset in a particular format.

@graph.rdfs:label: ordered
@graph.skos:definition: A boolean atomic property taking a single value which indicates whether a list that is the value of the cell is ordered (if `true`) or unordered (if `false`).

@graph.rdfs:label: Concept
@graph.skos:definition: A SKOS concept can be viewed as an idea or notion; a unit of thought. However, what constitutes a unit of thought is subjective, and this definition is meant to be suggestive, rather than restrictive.

@graph.rdfs:label: measurement of
@graph.skos:definition: Indicates the metric being observed.

@graph.rdfs:label: Rights statement
@graph.skos:definition: A statement about the intellectual property rights (IPR) held in or over a resource, a legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource, or a statement about access rights.

@graph.rdfs:label: transformations
@graph.skos:definition: An array property of transformation definitions that provide mechanisms to transform the tabular data into other formats.

@graph.rdfs:label: Catalog Record
@graph.skos:definition: A record in a data catalog, describing the registration of a single dataset or data service.

@graph.rdfs:label: qualified relation
@graph.skos:definition: Link to a description of a relationship with another resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: documentation
@graph.skos:definition: This property refers to a page or document about this Dataset or Distribution.

@graph.rdfs:label: record
@graph.skos:definition: A record describing the registration of a single dataset or data service that is part of the catalog.

@graph.rdfs:label: has version
@graph.skos:definition: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: has usage tool
@graph.skos:definition: A usage tool (application, service) referred to by usage guidance/instructions.

@graph.rdfs:label: foreign key
@graph.skos:definition: An array property of foreign key definitions that define how the values from specified columns within this table link to rows within this table or other tables.

@graph.rdfs:label: Agent
@graph.skos:definition: An agent (eg. person, group, software or physical artifact).

@graph.rdfs:label: access URL
@graph.skos:definition: URL at which the data was accessed.

@graph.rdfs:label: version notes
@graph.skos:definition: A description of changes between this version and the previous version of the Asset.

@graph.rdfs:label: Legal ground
@graph.skos:definition: Legal grounds for publicly available dataset.

@graph.rdfs:label: separator
@graph.skos:definition: An atomic property that MUST have a single string value that is the character used to separate items in the string value of the cell.

@graph.rdfs:label: availability
@graph.skos:definition: The property states how long in the distribution planned to be available.

@graph.rdfs:label: null
@graph.skos:definition: An atomic property giving the string or strings used for null values within the data. If the string value of the cell is equal to any one of these values, the cell value is `null`.

@graph.rdfs:label: column
@graph.skos:definition: An array property of column descriptions as described in section 5.6 Columns.

@graph.rdfs:label: status
@graph.skos:definition: Links to the status of the Asset or Asset Distribution in the context of a particular workflow process. Since Status is defined using a skos:Concept, that is the defined range for this property.

@graph.rdfs:label: description of service end-point
@graph.skos:definition: A description of the service end-point, including its operations, parameters etc.

@graph.rdfs:label: minimum time period, resolvable in a dataset
@graph.skos:definition: Minimum time period resolvable in a dataset.

@graph.rdfs:label: was derived from
@graph.skos:definition: A derivation is a transformation of an entity into another, an update of an entity resulting in a new one, or the construction of a new entity based on a pre-existing entity.

@graph.dce:title: The Slovene Data map ontology
@graph.dct:title: Data map schema
@graph.rdfs:comment: PZ is an RDF vocabulary designed to facilitate description of Slovene Open Data portals. By using PZ to describe datasets, distributions and attributes, publishers may increase discoverability of their datasets and enable users to find an appropriate API to consume the desired data.
@graph.rdfs:label: Data map schema
Metric
@graph.skos:definition: Represents a standard to measure a quality dimension. An observation (instance of dqv:QualityMeasurement) assigns a value in a given unit to a Metric.

@graph.rdfs:label: creator
@graph.skos:definition: An entity responsible for making the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: version information
@graph.skos:definition: The annotation property that provides version information for an ontology or another OWL construct.

@graph.rdfs:label: rights
@graph.skos:definition: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: default
@graph.skos:definition: An atomic property holding a single string that is used to create a default value for the cell in cases where the original string value is an empty string.

@graph.rdfs:label: property URL
@graph.skos:definition: An URI template property that MAY be used to create a URI for a property if the table is mapped to another format.

@graph.rdfs:label: serves dataset
@graph.skos:definition: A collection of data that this DataService can distribute.

@graph.rdfs:label: computed on
@graph.skos:definition: Refers to the resource (e.g., a dataset, a linkset, a graph, a set of triples) on which the quality measurement is performed. In the DQV context, this property is generally expected to be used in statements in which objects are instances of dcat:Dataset or dcat:Distribution.

@graph.rdfs:label: text direction
@graph.skos:definition: An atomic property that must have a single value that is one of `rtl` or `ltr` (the default).

@graph.rdfs:label: qualified attribution
@graph.skos:definition: Attribution is the ascribing of an entity to an agent, who generated the entity.

@graph.rdfs:label: generated by
@graph.skos:definition: Generation is the completion of production of a new entity by an activity. This entity did not exist before generation and becomes available for usage after this generation.

@graph.rdfs:label: has quality measurement
@graph.skos:definition: Refers to the performed quality measurements. Quality measurements can be performed to any kind of resource (e.g., a dataset, a linkset, a graph, a set of triples). However, in the DQV context, this property is generally expected to be used in statements in which subjects are instances of dcat:Dataset or dcat:Distribution.

@graph.rdfs:label: suppress output
@graph.skos:definition: A boolean atomic property. If `true`, suppresses any output that would be generated when converting a table or cells within a column.

@graph.rdfs:label: contains part
@graph.skos:definition: Contains a part of other catalog.

@graph.rdfs:label: User feedback
@graph.skos:definition: User feedback on a dataset or distribution.

@graph.rdfs:label: legal grounds
@graph.skos:definition: Definition of legal grounds to publish a dataset.

@graph.rdfs:label: expected data type
@graph.skos:definition: Represents the expected data type for the metric's observed value (e.g., xsd:boolean, xsd:double etc...)

@graph.rdfs:label: spatial coverage
@graph.skos:definition: Spatial characteristics of the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: legal ground SOP
@graph.skos:definition: Legal ground having a SOP number.

@graph.rdfs:label: Rating feedback
@graph.skos:definition: Predefined criteria used to express a user opinion about a dataset or distribution using a discrete range of values.

@graph.rdfs:label: dataset
@graph.skos:definition: A collection of data that is listed in the catalog.

@graph.rdfs:label: date modified
@graph.skos:definition: Date on which the resource was changed.

@graph.rdfs:label: Harvesting
@graph.skos:definition: Description and metadata regarding data retrieval and ingestion into CKAN.
